00091

00094

00199 bool CommonChControl::SetupBoard( GenericBoard* p_board, int ch_index, int ch_count)
00200 {
00201         this->m_p_board= p_board;
00202         this->m_ch_index= ch_index;
00203         this->m_ch_count= ch_count;
00204         if( ( size_t)this->m_ch_index>= this->m_p_board->m_channel_array.GetCount())
00205                 return false;
00206         this->m_p_board_channel= (PhysicalBoardChannel*)this->m_p_board->m_channel_array[ this->m_ch_index];
00207         this->m_p_board_channel->m_p_common_ch_control= this;
00208 
00209         if( !this->UpdateControls())
00210                 return false;
00211         return true;
00212 }
00213 bool CommonChControl::UpdateControls( )
00214 {
00215         this->m_main_sizer_text->SetLabel( wxString::Format( "%d", this->m_ch_count));
00216         this->m_ch_enable_control->SetValue( this->m_p_board_channel->m_enabled);
00217         this->m_ch_enable_control->SetLabel( this->m_ch_enable_control->GetValue( )? _("Disable"): _("Enable"));
00218         this->m_ch_DAC_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_p_board_channel->m_DAC_offset_bit));
00219         this->UpdateDAC();
00220 
00221         return true;
00222 }
00223 
00228 void CommonChControl::OnEnableTogglebuttonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/ )
00229 {
00230         this->m_p_board_channel->m_enabled= this->m_ch_enable_control->GetValue( )!= 0;
00231         this->m_ch_enable_control->SetLabel( this->m_ch_enable_control->GetValue( )? _("Disable"): _("Enable"));
00232         this->m_p_board->WriteTriggerMode( this->m_p_board->IsRunning());
00233         this->m_p_board_channel->WriteChannelTrigger();
00234         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
00235         {
00236                 (this->m_p_board_channel->ScopeRefresh)( i, true);
00237         }
00238 }
00239 
00240 void CommonChControl::UpdateDAC( void)
00241 {
00242         this->m_p_board_channel->m_DAC_offset_bit= this->m_ch_DAC_control->GetValue( );
00243         this->m_p_board_channel->WriteDACOffset( );
00244 }
00245 
00250 void CommonChControl::OnButtonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/)
00251 {
00252         this->m_ch_DAC_control->SetValue( 0);
00253         this->UpdateDAC();
00254 }
00255 
00260 void CommonChControl::OnSpinbuttonUpdated( wxSpinEvent& /* event*/ )
00261 {
00262         this->UpdateDAC();
00263 }
00264 
00265 void CommonChControl::SetMediumLabel( double value)
00266 {
00267         this->m_medium_value_control->SetLabel( wxString::Format( "%.3f", value));
00268 }
00269 void CommonChControl::SetEnable( bool enable, bool disable_all)
00270 {
00271         if( disable_all)
00272         {
00273                 this->m_ch_enable_control->Enable( false);
00274                 this->m_ch_DAC_control->Enable( false);
00275                 this->m_ch_DAC_reset_control->Enable( false);
00276         }
00277         else
00278         {
00279                 this->m_ch_enable_control->Enable( enable);
00280                 this->m_ch_DAC_control->Enable( true);
00281                 this->m_ch_DAC_reset_control->Enable( true);
00282         }
00283 }
00284 
00285 void CommonChControl::SetOverloadBackground( const wxColor& color)
00286 {
00287         this->m_overload_control->SetBackgroundColour( color);
00288         this->m_overload_control->Refresh();
00289 }
